nodes.text: A violent civil conflict erupted on the planet Duro many years before the beginning of the Great Galactic War in 3681 BBY, pitting members of the native Duros species against other Duros and forcing the Jedi Order to intervene in order to end the bloodshed. Among the Jedi sent to Duro was the Kel Dor Tol Braga on his first assignment as a Jedi Knight, and the violence Braga witnessed on the planet convinced the Kel Dor to become a determined pacifist.

The conflict on Duro is mentioned only in the Codex entry for Jedi Master Tol Braga, a character featured in Act II of the Jedi Knight storyline in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released in late 2011. The exact date and outcome of the conflict is never specified.
